type.name: org.gradle.process.ExecSpec
type.description: Specified the options for executing some command.

method.name: setCommandLine
method.description:
Sets the full command line, including the executable to be executed plus its arguments.
param:args the command plus the args to be executed

method.name: getArgs
method.description: Returns the arguments for the command to be executed. Defaults to an empty list.

method.name: commandLine
method.description:
Sets the full command line, including the executable to be executed plus its arguments.
param:args the command plus the args to be executed

returns:this

method.name: commandLine
method.description:
Sets the full command line, including the executable to be executed plus its arguments.
param:args the command plus the args to be executed

returns:this

method.name: args
method.description:
Adds arguments for the command to be executed.
param:args args for the command

returns:this

method.name: setArgs
method.description:
Sets the arguments for the command to be executed.
param:args args for the command

returns:this

method.name: args
method.description:
Adds arguments for the command to be executed.
param:args args for the command

returns:this
